#### From: This Senate Panel On The Vaccines Is The Red Pill We've All Been Waiting For

 **[A Midwestern Doctor Substack](https://www.midwesterndoctor.com/p/this-senate-panel-on-the-vaccines?utm_campaign=email-post&r=ofo3r&utm_source=substack&utm_medium=email)** 

[Ron Johnson](https://substack.com/redirect/c6fc912a-e215-48e7-9d76-efd47ca0b4d9?j=eyJ1Ijoib2ZvM3IifQ.KxQt84zgroF_h4uz6z8PO9ftzjtR6bzmtZ7l9nAIQ9c) has gradually become one of my favorite senators in American history. [In 2020](https://substack.com/redirect/c6fc912a-e215-48e7-9d76-efd47ca0b4d9?j=eyJ1Ijoib2ZvM3IifQ.KxQt84zgroF_h4uz6z8PO9ftzjtR6bzmtZ7l9nAIQ9c), he repeatedly advocated for early COVID-19 treatments to be made available to Americans (which had they been made available would have ended the pandemic).

[Throughout 2021](https://substack.com/redirect/c6fc912a-e215-48e7-9d76-efd47ca0b4d9?j=eyJ1Ijoib2ZvM3IifQ.KxQt84zgroF_h4uz6z8PO9ftzjtR6bzmtZ7l9nAIQ9c), he spoke out against the vaccine mandates and in November [hosted a panel](https://substack.com/redirect/d73c464e-870f-4c17-a5ed-b26cfc0798cf?j=eyJ1Ijoib2ZvM3IifQ.KxQt84zgroF_h4uz6z8PO9ftzjtR6bzmtZ7l9nAIQ9c) at the Senate which scrutinized the federal vaccine mandates and exposed how poorly those who experienced severe COVID-19 vaccine injuries were being treated. In January 2022, [he hosted a panel](https://substack.com/redirect/bb759dbe-03c4-4b70-ac34-9ebfd798383c?j=eyJ1Ijoib2ZvM3IifQ.KxQt84zgroF_h4uz6z8PO9ftzjtR6bzmtZ7l9nAIQ9c) which scrutinized the entire COVID-19 response, and in December of 2022, [he hosted a panel](https://substack.com/redirect/40d083e9-daca-44aa-9fab-945c54c48603?j=eyJ1Ijoib2ZvM3IifQ.KxQt84zgroF_h4uz6z8PO9ftzjtR6bzmtZ7l9nAIQ9c) focusing on everything we now know about the vaccines.

Being one of the most outspoken critics of the vaccination program in American history got him a lot of pushback, and in 2022, he decided to postpone his retirement to go through a grueling re-election campaign so there would be someone in the government who could advocate for everyone whose lives had been ruined by the COVID vaccines.

Despite being public enemy number one of the pharmaceutical industry, Johnson narrowly won, becoming the first politician in America’s history to run on the vaccine safety issue and win. Since then Johnson has kept his promise and fought for the vaccine injured (along with taking a variety of other difficult but important positions such as giving [one of the most poignant speeches I’ve heard on the Ukraine War](https://substack.com/redirect/d260246b-6057-4c92-b2e8-5ada6df5fa6a?j=eyJ1Ijoib2ZvM3IifQ.KxQt84zgroF_h4uz6z8PO9ftzjtR6bzmtZ7l9nAIQ9c) when he tried to block the Senate from continuing to fund it).

A lot of work has gone into producing each of the vaccine panels he’s hosted. On Monday, he hosted “[Federal Health Agencies and the COVID Cartel: What Are They Hiding](https://substack.com/redirect/8b854a82-f38a-4097-ba31-8c040ab4c900?j=eyJ1Ijoib2ZvM3IifQ.KxQt84zgroF_h4uz6z8PO9ftzjtR6bzmtZ7l9nAIQ9c) **[?](https://substack.com/redirect/8b854a82-f38a-4097-ba31-8c040ab4c900?j=eyJ1Ijoib2ZvM3IifQ.KxQt84zgroF_h4uz6z8PO9ftzjtR6bzmtZ7l9nAIQ9c)”** When it was all said and done, I **** believe this panel was the most effective presentation I have seen for explaining what happened throughout COVID-19 and waking people up to how much they have been lied to. Because of this I strongly encourage you to watch or share his presentation with people who you think might be open to understanding exactly what was done to all of us. This article will begin [with his entire panel](https://substack.com/redirect/8b854a82-f38a-4097-ba31-8c040ab4c900?j=eyJ1Ijoib2ZvM3IifQ.KxQt84zgroF_h4uz6z8PO9ftzjtR6bzmtZ7l9nAIQ9c):

[<img src="https://ci3.googleusercontent.com/meips/ADKq_NajO_gqmGZDJsh1vykwcc9zbBaKYhZw8YSRWnslyY82ljLCHkc1A8p6AU15SncbeyVYJTyjA1AH2IzqxqeY_Shaag-dj0oDDYr1YW5lHGV64x8uZp2cROvgOGGjpptCsz1Te_W701QL8QLZXF9T0XxCLstNKvE7IVEosR0vNJ0VZaoyDmTAqC5O8HKaTYZ7qh2VQhh32tJ1aZrsHIb3EYEZJm8wJ_1AaPaHEjE-e9aF0rdCBiFjgEa5mHYbdgJJMQB3qjP4dRSf9pEkFLaLy9EP20OTo8B93sytW7YW5T3Va1Nxi_oVefELpJ6aVKE1EZVoEF6bBf4F0J2wZyoxy6nlVJqISKoL2JX_jEUOe9a5B7Dz6kMzZ_zT3wTpkv-PD4xe-8rGVYxMbnnCz7rxJBfmxdZdyE4VivlfoXkpqFVb1A5YMrS4MrDppJ0Li3p1B2YG58SzAz6A3S6VMKXxreWaw8a2fPHCmU3S-FCNdKwPP0m4r79F1mk4hsyF=s0-d-e1-ft#https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1100,h_618,c_fill,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/l_video_play_base_tu77jd,w_152,e_colorize:100,co_rgb:E2E0E0/l_video_play_icon_c75z6z,w_120,e_colorize:100,co_rgb:161718/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-video.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fvideo_upload%2Fpost%2F142113942%2Ff4a96bf2-70cd-43f1-b9f0-ddb5d02b6082%2Ftranscoded-00001.png" alt="image">](https://substack.com/redirect/34773da8-1b5c-45d9-b248-d1ee51fe1b05?j=eyJ1Ijoib2ZvM3IifQ.KxQt84zgroF_h4uz6z8PO9ftzjtR6bzmtZ7l9nAIQ9c)

Note: I have been struggling to find the best term for these criminals. The four I’ve used are listed below; I would appreciate knowing what you think is the best one.

[The COVID Cartel](https://substack..JFD9AtdZ1tuuB3q0YYNQTzsighWGAJV61G7Xa72AkWg?)

[The Pandemic Profiteers](https://substack..xv1cJIgSz5AUa9Mmr90qu6AsSGTeonH1GEoM32VoADY?)

[The Pandemic Industrial Complex](https://substack..EvWObtFeoh14ZpPn5ojqRIDZCV1EtFMS4a2Pml3wg18?)

[The Biosecurity Agenda](https://substack..USLjU7MESoshpZclDzJSs_FxeygrgK667veCBs1w8S4?)

Lastly, for those who prefer to read, a transcript of Johnson’s symposium can be found [here](https://substack.com/redirect/665b43a7-997a-400f-a1a9-c9060acc2efb?j=eyJ1Ijoib2ZvM3IifQ.KxQt84zgroF_h4uz6z8PO9ftzjtR6bzmtZ7l9nAIQ9c).

---

#### From: This Senate Panel On The Vaccines Is The Red Pill We&#39;ve All Been Waiting For

 **[A Midwestern Doctor Substack](https://www.midwesterndoctor.com/p/this-senate-panel-on-the-vaccines?utm_campaign=email-post&amp;r=ofo3r&amp;utm_source=substack&amp;utm_medium=email)** 

[Ron Johnson](https://substack.com/redirect/c6fc912a-e215-48e7-9d76-efd47ca0b4d9?j=eyJ1Ijoib2ZvM3IifQ.KxQt84zgroF_h4uz6z8PO9ftzjtR6bzmtZ7l9nAIQ9c) has gradually become one of my favorite senators in American history. [In 2020](https://substack.com/redirect/c6fc912a-e215-48e7-9d76-efd47ca0b4d9?j=eyJ1Ijoib2ZvM3IifQ.KxQt84zgroF_h4uz6z8PO9ftzjtR6bzmtZ7l9nAIQ9c), he repeatedly advocated for early COVID-19 treatments to be made available to Americans (which had they been made available would have ended the pandemic).

[Throughout 2021](https://substack.com/redirect/c6fc912a-e215-48e7-9d76-efd47ca0b4d9?j=eyJ1Ijoib2ZvM3IifQ.KxQt84zgroF_h4uz6z8PO9ftzjtR6bzmtZ7l9nAIQ9c), he spoke out against the vaccine mandates and in November [hosted a panel](https://substack.com/redirect/d73c464e-870f-4c17-a5ed-b26cfc0798cf?j=eyJ1Ijoib2ZvM3IifQ.KxQt84zgroF_h4uz6z8PO9ftzjtR6bzmtZ7l9nAIQ9c) at the Senate which scrutinized the federal vaccine mandates and exposed how poorly those who experienced severe COVID-19 vaccine injuries were being treated. In January 2022, [he hosted a panel](https://substack.com/redirect/bb759dbe-03c4-4b70-ac34-9ebfd798383c?j=eyJ1Ijoib2ZvM3IifQ.KxQt84zgroF_h4uz6z8PO9ftzjtR6bzmtZ7l9nAIQ9c) which scrutinized the entire COVID-19 response, and in December of 2022, [he hosted a panel](https://substack.com/redirect/40d083e9-daca-44aa-9fab-945c54c48603?j=eyJ1Ijoib2ZvM3IifQ.KxQt84zgroF_h4uz6z8PO9ftzjtR6bzmtZ7l9nAIQ9c) focusing on everything we now know about the vaccines.

Being one of the most outspoken critics of the vaccination program in American history got him a lot of pushback, and in 2022, he decided to postpone his retirement to go through a grueling re-election campaign so there would be someone in the government who could advocate for everyone whose lives had been ruined by the COVID vaccines.

Despite being public enemy number one of the pharmaceutical industry, Johnson narrowly won, becoming the first politician in America’s history to run on the vaccine safety issue and win. Since then Johnson has kept his promise and fought for the vaccine injured (along with taking a variety of other difficult but important positions such as giving [one of the most poignant speeches I’ve heard on the Ukraine War](https://substack.com/redirect/d260246b-6057-4c92-b2e8-5ada6df5fa6a?j=eyJ1Ijoib2ZvM3IifQ.KxQt84zgroF_h4uz6z8PO9ftzjtR6bzmtZ7l9nAIQ9c) when he tried to block the Senate from continuing to fund it).

A lot of work has gone into producing each of the vaccine panels he’s hosted. On Monday, he hosted “[Federal Health Agencies and the COVID Cartel: What Are They Hiding](https://substack.com/redirect/8b854a82-f38a-4097-ba31-8c040ab4c900?j=eyJ1Ijoib2ZvM3IifQ.KxQt84zgroF_h4uz6z8PO9ftzjtR6bzmtZ7l9nAIQ9c) **[?](https://substack.com/redirect/8b854a82-f38a-4097-ba31-8c040ab4c900?j=eyJ1Ijoib2ZvM3IifQ.KxQt84zgroF_h4uz6z8PO9ftzjtR6bzmtZ7l9nAIQ9c)”** When it was all said and done, I **** believe this panel was the most effective presentation I have seen for explaining what happened throughout COVID-19 and waking people up to how much they have been lied to. Because of this I strongly encourage you to watch or share his presentation with people who you think might be open to understanding exactly what was done to all of us. This article will begin [with his entire panel](https://substack.com/redirect/8b854a82-f38a-4097-ba31-8c040ab4c900?j=eyJ1Ijoib2ZvM3IifQ.KxQt84zgroF_h4uz6z8PO9ftzjtR6bzmtZ7l9nAIQ9c):

[The Pandemic Industrial Complex](https://substack..EvWObtFeoh14ZpPn5ojqRIDZCV1EtFMS4a2Pml3wg18?)

│   ├── ImgNode

│   │   attrs_dict:

Original Tiki:
-------------
{DIV(class=&quot;lefth4&quot;)}{maketoc Title=&quot;&quot;}{DIV}
---
!!!!From: This Senate Panel On The Vaccines Is The Red Pill We&#39;ve All Been Waiting For
__[https://www.midwesterndoctor.com/p/this-senate-panel-on-the-vaccines?utm_campaign=email-post&amp;r=ofo3r&amp;utm_source=substack&amp;utm_medium=email|A Midwestern Doctor Substack]__
[https://substack.com/redirect/c6fc912a-e215-48e7-9d76-efd47ca0b4d9?j=eyJ1Ijoib2ZvM3IifQ.KxQt84zgroF_h4uz6z8PO9ftzjtR6bzmtZ7l9nAIQ9c|Ron Johnson] has gradually become one of my favorite senators in American history. [https://substack.com/redirect/c6fc912a-e215-48e7-9d76-efd47ca0b4d9?j=eyJ1Ijoib2ZvM3IifQ.KxQt84zgroF_h4uz6z8PO9ftzjtR6bzmtZ7l9nAIQ9c|In 2020], he repeatedly advocated for early COVID-19 treatments to be made available to Americans (which had they been made available would have ended the pandemic).

[https://substack.com/redirect/c6fc912a-e215-48e7-9d76-efd47ca0b4d9?j=eyJ1Ijoib2ZvM3IifQ.KxQt84zgroF_h4uz6z8PO9ftzjtR6bzmtZ7l9nAIQ9c|Throughout 2021], he spoke out against the vaccine mandates and in November [https://substack.com/redirect/d73c464e-870f-4c17-a5ed-b26cfc0798cf?j=eyJ1Ijoib2ZvM3IifQ.KxQt84zgroF_h4uz6z8PO9ftzjtR6bzmtZ7l9nAIQ9c|hosted a panel] at the Senate which scrutinized the federal vaccine mandates and exposed how poorly those who experienced severe COVID-19 vaccine injuries were being treated. In January 2022, [https://substack.com/redirect/bb759dbe-03c4-4b70-ac34-9ebfd798383c?j=eyJ1Ijoib2ZvM3IifQ.KxQt84zgroF_h4uz6z8PO9ftzjtR6bzmtZ7l9nAIQ9c|he hosted a panel] which scrutinized the entire COVID-19 response, and in December of 2022, [https://substack.com/redirect/40d083e9-daca-44aa-9fab-945c54c48603?j=eyJ1Ijoib2ZvM3IifQ.KxQt84zgroF_h4uz6z8PO9ftzjtR6bzmtZ7l9nAIQ9c|he hosted a panel] focusing on everything we now know about the vaccines.

Being one of the most outspoken critics of the vaccination program in American history got him a lot of pushback, and in 2022, he decided to postpone his retirement to go through a grueling re-election campaign so there would be someone in the government who could advocate for everyone whose lives had been ruined by the COVID vaccines.

Despite being public enemy number one of the pharmaceutical industry, Johnson narrowly won, becoming the first politician in America’s history to run on the vaccine safety issue and win. Since then Johnson has kept his promise and fought for the vaccine injured (along with taking a variety of other difficult but important positions such as giving [https://substack.com/redirect/d260246b-6057-4c92-b2e8-5ada6df5fa6a?j=eyJ1Ijoib2ZvM3IifQ.KxQt84zgroF_h4uz6z8PO9ftzjtR6bzmtZ7l9nAIQ9c|one of the most poignant speeches I’ve heard on the Ukraine War] when he tried to block the Senate from continuing to fund it).

A lot of work has gone into producing each of the vaccine panels he’s hosted. On Monday, he hosted “&#39;&#39;[https://substack.com/redirect/8b854a82-f38a-4097-ba31-8c040ab4c900?j=eyJ1Ijoib2ZvM3IifQ.KxQt84zgroF_h4uz6z8PO9ftzjtR6bzmtZ7l9nAIQ9c|Federal Health Agencies and the COVID Cartel: What Are They Hiding]&#39;&#39;__[https://substack.com/redirect/8b854a82-f38a-4097-ba31-8c040ab4c900?j=eyJ1Ijoib2ZvM3IifQ.KxQt84zgroF_h4uz6z8PO9ftzjtR6bzmtZ7l9nAIQ9c|?]” __When it was all said and done, I__ __believe this panel was the most effective presentation I have seen for explaining what happened throughout COVID-19 and waking people up to how much they have been lied to. Because of this I strongly encourage you to watch or share his presentation with people who you think might be open to understanding exactly what was done to all of us. This article will begin [https://substack.com/redirect/8b854a82-f38a-4097-ba31-8c040ab4c900?j=eyJ1Ijoib2ZvM3IifQ.KxQt84zgroF_h4uz6z8PO9ftzjtR6bzmtZ7l9nAIQ9c|with his entire panel]:

[https://substack.com/redirect/34773da8-1b5c-45d9-b248-d1ee51fe1b05?j=eyJ1Ijoib2ZvM3IifQ.KxQt84zgroF_h4uz6z8PO9ftzjtR6bzmtZ7l9nAIQ9c|{img src=&quot;https://ci3.googleusercontent.com/meips/ADKq_NajO_gqmGZDJsh1vykwcc9zbBaKYhZw8YSRWnslyY82ljLCHkc1A8p6AU15SncbeyVYJTyjA1AH2IzqxqeY_Shaag-dj0oDDYr1YW5lHGV64x8uZp2cROvgOGGjpptCsz1Te_W701QL8QLZXF9T0XxCLstNKvE7IVEosR0vNJ0VZaoyDmTAqC5O8HKaTYZ7qh2VQhh32tJ1aZrsHIb3EYEZJm8wJ_1AaPaHEjE-e9aF0rdCBiFjgEa5mHYbdgJJMQB3qjP4dRSf9pEkFLaLy9EP20OTo8B93sytW7YW5T3Va1Nxi_oVefELpJ6aVKE1EZVoEF6bBf4F0J2wZyoxy6nlVJqISKoL2JX_jEUOe9a5B7Dz6kMzZ_zT3wTpkv-PD4xe-8rGVYxMbnnCz7rxJBfmxdZdyE4VivlfoXkpqFVb1A5YMrS4MrDppJ0Li3p1B2YG58SzAz6A3S6VMKXxreWaw8a2fPHCmU3S-FCNdKwPP0m4r79F1mk4hsyF=s0-d-e1-ft#https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1100,h_618,c_fill,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/l_video_play_base_tu77jd,w_152,e_colorize:100,co_rgb:E2E0E0/l_video_play_icon_c75z6z,w_120,e_colorize:100,co_rgb:161718/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-video.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fvideo_upload%2Fpost%2F142113942%2Ff4a96bf2-70cd-43f1-b9f0-ddb5d02b6082%2Ftranscoded-00001.png&quot;}]

&#39;&#39;Note: I have been struggling to find the best term for these criminals. The four I’ve used are listed below; I would appreciate knowing what you think is the best one.&#39;&#39;

[https://substack..USLjU7MESoshpZclDzJSs_FxeygrgK667veCBs1w8S4?|The Biosecurity Agenda]
Lastly, for those who prefer to read, a transcript of Johnson’s symposium can be found [https://substack.com/redirect/665b43a7-997a-400f-a1a9-c9060acc2efb?j=eyJ1Ijoib2ZvM3IifQ.KxQt84zgroF_h4uz6z8PO9ftzjtR6bzmtZ7l9nAIQ9c|here].
